entries.question: How patiently has God borne with sinners?
In what way has God told the world of His love?
What final phase of the everlasting gospel is to be proclaimed to mankind?
authorNote: Angels do not preach the gospel. That privilege is reserved for men. (Matthew 28:19,20). The angel in these verses represents a worldwide movement which gives emphasis to the final warning from God. The world is told that the judgment in heaven has commenced, and that all are to worship God as the Creator, which is done by remembering the Sabbath day and keeping it holy.
